sys_ux_client_script.name: SecondaryItemsPopulator

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_14089ac11b20b1500f0eda43cc4bcbec
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Sales Order Case">9c0892c11b20b1500f0eda43cc4bcb5f</macroponent><name>SecondaryItemsPopulator</name><preset/><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
  * @param {params} params
  * @param {api} params.api
  * @param {any} params.imports
  */
function evaluateProperty({ api }) {
    if (api.context.app.record_secondary_values_location !== 'sidebar'
        && api.data.gform && api.data.gform.nowRecordCommonHeader
        && api.data.gform.nowRecordCommonHeader.secondaryItems
        && api.data.gform.nowRecordCommonHeader.secondaryItems.length) {
        const secondaryItems = api.data.gform.nowRecordCommonHeader.secondaryItems;
        return secondaryItems.map((item) => {
            let value = {};
            if (item.type === "reference")
                value = {
                    "type": "text-link",
                    "label": item.displayValue,
                    "href": "javascript:void(0)",
                    "value": item.sysId,
                    "data": item
                };
            else if (item.type === "highlighted")
                value = {
                    "type": "highlighted-value",
                    "label": item.displayValue,
                    "status": item.colorName,
                    "showIcon": item.showIcon,
                    "icon": item.iconName,
                    "value": item.sysId,
                    "data": item
                };
            else
                value = {
                    "type": "string",
                    "value": item.displayValue,
                    "data": item
                };

            return {
                "label": item.fieldLabel,
                "value": value
            };
        });
    }
    return [];
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>TBlev1</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-08-07 18:25:58</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>14089ac11b20b1500f0eda43cc4bcbec</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SecondaryItemsPopulator</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Insight Process Management" source="x_snc_insight_pr_0">39bd5e9747f05510ab51f109536d431c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Insight Process Management">39bd5e9747f05510ab51f109536d431c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_14089ac11b20b1500f0eda43cc4bcbec</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>TBlev1</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-08-07 18:25:58</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
